column4: I need help bad, this is very very scary.... I dragged and dropped some folders from one of my docky bars to the trash. i thought just the folder links would be deleted, however it seems to have deleted the actual folders and data.... they are not in my trashcan, they are not in the root trashcan either.... These folders had like 500gigs of stuff.... I am freaking out can someone help me!!!!!

I need help bad, this is very very scary.... I dragged and dropped some folders from one of my docky bars to the trash. i thought just the folder links would be deleted, however it seems to have deleted the actual folders and data.... they are not in my trashcan, they are not in the root trashcan either.... These folders had like 500gigs of stuff.... I am freaking out can someone help me!!!!!
You might want to try "sudo updatedb && locate <folder>" to see if it's still in file structures or not.
